description: All tables related to Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

tables.name: MDCDetectionFimEvents
tables.description: Events from this table are collected by the detection team in MDC.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: The Azure resource ID of the resource whose monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The region the resource whose monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: Computer
columns.description: The name of the machine on which the monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: EventType
columns.description: The type of change that occurred on the entity. Must be either 'Created', 'Modified', 'Renamed' or 'Deleted'.

columns.name: FileName
columns.description: Holds the name of the file that was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: FileType
columns.description: Holds the type of the file that was created, renamed, modified or deleted. Example of possible values: Zip, PDF, Xar etc.

columns.name: FilePath
columns.description: Holds the path of the file that was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: IsDir
columns.description: True if event is for a directory, false if event is for a file.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessId
columns.description: Holds the process Id of the initiating process that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessName
columns.description: Holds the name of the initiating process that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: InitiatingParentProcessId
columns.description: Holds the process Id of the initiating parents process that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: InitiatingParentProcessName
columns.description: Holds the name of the initiating parents process that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountDomainName
columns.description: Holds the name of the process account domain that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: InitiatingProcessAccountName
columns.description: Holds the name of the process account that caused the monitored entity event.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: Holds the Tivan Agent Id.
Holds the Tivan Agent Id.

columns.name: DataPipelineMetadata
columns.description: Holds Data PipelineMetadata.

columns.name: AdditionalData
columns.description: Holds Additional Data.

tables.name: MDCDetectionK8SApiEvents
tables.description: Events from this table are collected by the detection team in MDC.

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: The unique identifier for the Azure resource.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The Azure region where the resource is located.

columns.name: Timestamp
columns.description: The time at which this event was captured.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: K8SClusterName
columns.description: The name of the K8S cluster containing the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SNamespaceName
columns.description: The namespace containing the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SDeploymentName
columns.description: The name of the deployment containing the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SDaemonsetName
columns.description: The name of the daemonset containing the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SStatefulsetName
columns.description: The name of the stateful set containing the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SNodeName
columns.description: The name of the node that has the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: K8SPodName
columns.description: The name of the pod from where this event was captured.

columns.name: RequestId
columns.description: A unique identifier that identifies the request and response events for one specific request-response pair.

columns.name: IsRequest
columns.description: Whether this event is for the request or the response. True if this event is for the request. False if this event is for the response.

columns.name: Method
columns.description: The HTTP verb for this request.

columns.name: Url
columns.description: The full url for this request. This will contain the scheme, host, port (if applicable), path, and query string.

columns.name: StatusCode
columns.description: The HTTP response code of the response for this request.

columns.name: Payload
columns.description: A chunk of payload for the request or the response in this event. The full payload for the request and/or the response may be split into multiple chunks.

columns.name: PayloadLength
columns.description: The length of the payload chunk in this event. If there is no payload, this value will be zero.

columns.name: ChunkNum
columns.description: The index of the payload chunk. Starts from zero. If the full payload is broken into chunks, this value represents which chunk is in this event.

columns.name: IsLastChunk
columns.description: Whether the payload chunk in this event is the last one or not. True if this is the last chunk; false otherwise.

columns.name: PayloadType
columns.description: The value of the Content-Type header, if present.

columns.name: PayloadEncoding
columns.description: The value of the Content-Encoding header, if present.

columns.name: AuthenticationTypes
columns.description: A list of well-known authentication mechanisms that were detected, e.g., Authorization header or API keys.

columns.name: ContainsAuthentication
columns.description: Whether a well-known authentication mechanism was detected. True if any authentication mechanism was detected, false otherwise.

columns.name: ClientIPs
columns.description: A list of client IPs extracted from the X-Forwarded-For header in the request.

columns.name: ContainsPublicIp
columns.description: Whether one of the IPs extracted from the X-Forwarded-For header in the request is a public IP.

columns.name: Elapsed
columns.description: The time in milliseconds that have elapsed between the request and the response events.

columns.name: AdditionalMetadata
columns.description: Metadata related to the event.

columns.name: DataPipelineMetadata
columns.description: Metadata related to the data processing pipeline.

tables.name: MDCDetectionDNSEvents
tables.description: DNS Events. This table is collected by the detection team in MDC.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: The Azure resource ID of the K8S cluster resource.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The region where the K8S cluster is deployed.

columns.name: ImageName
columns.description: The name of the Image running in the docker container which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Digest
columns.description: The digest of the Image running in the docker container which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: ContainerId
columns.description: The container id of the docker container which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: ContainerName
columns.description: The name of the docker container which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: PID
columns.description: The process id of the process which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Ppid
columns.description: The parent process id of the process which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Uid
columns.description: The user id of the user who initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Gid
columns.description: The group id of the user who initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Comm
columns.description: The command name which initiated the dns lookup call - i.e. curl, wget etc.

columns.name: PodName
columns.description: The name of the pod in which the container is running.

columns.name: NodeName
columns.description: The name of the node on which the pod is running.

columns.name: Namespace
columns.description: The namespace of the pod in which the container is running.

columns.name: Addresses
columns.description: The list of IP addresses resolved by the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: PacketId
columns.description: The packet id in the packet that was sent for the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: Latency
columns.description: The latency of the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: NameServer
columns.description: The nameserver used in order to resolve the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: QR
columns.description: Q for Query packets, R for Response packets.

columns.name: Qtype
columns.description: The type of the DNS query - i.e. A, AAAA, CNAME etc.

columns.name: Rcode
columns.description: A string representing Succes/Error DNS lookup result.

columns.name: Tid
columns.description: The thread id of the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: Domain
columns.description: The domain name that was queried/resolved by the DNS lookup call.

columns.name: DataPipelineMetadata
columns.description: Holds Data PipelineMetadata.

columns.name: AdditionalData
columns.description: Holds Additional Data.

columns.name: EventGuid
columns.description: The unique identifier for the event.

columns.name: Cwd
columns.description: The current working directory of the process which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Exe
columns.description: The executable path of the process which initiated the dns lookup call.

columns.name: Pcomm
columns.description: The parent command name which initiated the dns lookup call.

tables.name: MDCDetectionGatingValidationEvents
tables.description: K8s Gating validation events. This table is collected by the detection team in MDC.

columns.name: AzureResourceId
columns.description: The resource ID of the K8S cluster resource.

columns.name: Region
columns.description: The region where the K8S cluster is deployed.

columns.name: Action
columns.description: The validation action that was performed.

columns.name: RuleProperties
columns.description: The rule properties that was applied during the validation.

columns.name: AdmissionControlVersions
columns.description: The gating components versions.

columns.name: EvaluatedResourceKind
columns.description: The evaluated K8s resource kind.

columns.name: EvaluatedResourceName
columns.description: The evaluated K8s resource name.

columns.name: EvaluatedResourceParentKind
columns.description: The evaluated K8s resource's parent kind (Controlled By).

columns.name: EvaluatedResourceParentName
columns.description: The evaluated K8s resource's parent name (Controlled By).

columns.name: EvaluatedResourceDetails
columns.description: The evaluated resource details.

columns.name: Namespace
columns.description: The evaluated K8s resource namespace.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The time (UTC) when the monitored entity was created, renamed, modified or deleted.

tables.name: MDCDetectionProcessV2Events
tables.description: K8s process events. This table is collected by the detection team in MDC.

columns.name: Repository
columns.description: The container image repository.

columns.name: Tag
columns.description: The tag of the container image.

columns.name: Digest
columns.description: The SHA-256 digest of the container image.

columns.name: ContainerID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the running container.

columns.name: ContainerName
columns.description: The name of the container.

columns.name: Cmdline
columns.description: The command-line instruction that started the container.

columns.name: Cwd
columns.description: The current working directory of the container process.

columns.name: Pid
columns.description: The process ID of the containerized application.

columns.name: Ppid
columns.description: The parent process ID of the containerized application.

columns.name: Ses
columns.description: The session ID of the container process.

columns.name: AgentId
columns.description: The ID of the monitoring agent tracking the container.

columns.name: TimeGenerated
columns.description: The timestamp when the event was recorded in UTC.

columns.name: Computer
columns.description: The name of the node where the container is running.

columns.name: Uid
columns.description: The user ID under which the process is running.

columns.name: Gid
columns.description: The group ID under which the process is running.

columns.name: Auid
columns.description: The audit user ID associated with the container process.

columns.name: Comm
columns.description: The name of the executed command.

columns.name: Pname
columns.description: The parent process name of the containerized application.

columns.name: Exe
columns.description: The path to the executable running inside the container.

columns.name: Success
columns.description: Indicates whether the command execution was successful.

columns.name: PodName
columns.description: The name of the Kubernetes pod.

columns.name: Namespace
columns.description: The namespace where the Kubernetes pod is deployed.

columns.name: DriftAction
columns.description: Indicates if there were any modifications in the container files.

columns.name: User
columns.description: The username running the process inside the container.

columns.name: Group
columns.description: The group name associated with the process.

columns.name: Memfd
columns.description: Indicates if the container has memory file descriptor (memfd) execution.

columns.name: UpperLayer
columns.description: Indicates if the container image uses an upper layer in the overlay filesystem.

columns.name: AdditionalData
columns.description: Additional metadata about the container event.

columns.name: PodLabels
columns.description: Labels associated with the Kubernetes pod.

queries.description: Get all FIM events against directories of the host.

queries.displayName: All DNS events where the domain queried was 'www.google.com' ordered by time
queries.description: Get all DNS events where the domain queried was 'www.google.com' ordered by time.
Get all Gating validation events published in the last 24 hours.
